Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ActionController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ActionController
public class ActionController extends Object
ActionController is the controller class that modify the model after an action request has been received by a client who is the active player. The class controls if the requested action is the correct one (in base of the current phase and the actions that the player has already done): if so it performs the action, otherwise it sends and error back (also if the action was malformed)

    • ActionController

      public ActionController(GameController gameController, TurnController turnController)

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener(String propertyName, PropertyChangeListener listener)
      Adds a PropertyChangeListener to this class that will listen to events that are fired by this object
      Parameters:
      propertyName - the property name on which the listener will listen to events
      listener - the property change listener

    • doAction

      public void doAction(MessageFromClient message) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Process an action that has arrived from the client of the active player. If the action is the correct action that the client is expected to do, the method will process it, otherwise it sends ILLEGAL_TURN_ACTION error to the client
      Parameters:
      message - the message from the client
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the action was malformed

    • playAssistant

      public void playAssistant(MessagePayload payload) throws WrongTurnActionRequestedException
      Performs a PlayAssistant action from the client that has the specified MessagePayload. The method controls if the assistant can be played by checking if the player has such specified assistant and by checking if someone else has already played the assistant (in this case the player need to have only this assistant in order to play the specified assistant).
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload of the request
      Throws:
      WrongTurnActionRequestedException - if it is not expected by the client to play an assistant in this round moment (for example if the RoundPhase is action phase)

    • motherNatureMovement

      public void motherNatureMovement(MessagePayload payload) throws IllegalArgumentException, WrongTurnActionRequestedException
      Performs a MoveMotherNature action for the active player, which has sent a message that contains the specified payload. The method controls if the requested movement is greater that 0 and smaller or equal than the maximum movement that the player can perform.
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload of the request
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the movement requested is not correct
      WrongTurnActionRequestedException - if the current turn phase does not permit to move mother nature

    • studentMovement

      public void studentMovement(MessagePayload payload) throws IllegalArgumentException, WrongTurnActionRequestedException
      Performs a MoveStudents action for the active player, that have sent a message that contains the action in the specified MessagePayload. The method tries to move students, if it fails it does a rollback (students are reinserted in the entrance if the dining is full or if a student is not found on the entrance)
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload of the request
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request was malformed
      WrongTurnActionRequestedException - if the current turn phase does not permit to move students

    • getStudentsToDiningRoom

      private Student[] getStudentsToDiningRoom(List<?> students) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the students from the entrance that will be moved in the dining room in a MoveStudents action.
      Parameters:
      students - the students that need to be removed from the entrance (a list of RealmType)
      Returns:
      the students from the entrance that will be moved in the dining room in a MoveStudents action.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entrance doesn't contain the specified students

    • getStudentsToIslands

      private Map<Integer,List<Student>> getStudentsToIslands(List<?> students) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Returns the students from the entrance that will be moved in the islands in a MoveStudents action, associated with the id of the island on which they will be moved.
      Parameters:
      students - the students that need to be removed from the entrance (a list of pairs (RealmType,Integer) where the integer is the id of the island and the realm type is the type of student )
      Returns:
      the students from the entrance that will be moved in the dining room in a MoveStudents action.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the entrance doesn't contain the specified students

    • pickStudentsFromClouds

      public void pickStudentsFromClouds(MessagePayload payload) throws WrongTurnActionRequestedException, IllegalArgumentException
      Performs a PickFromCloud action for the active player, that have sent a message that contains the action in the specified MessagePayload.
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload of the message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the selected cloud is empty
      WrongTurnActionRequestedException - if the current turn phase does not permit to pick students from a cloud

    • playCharacter

      public void playCharacter(MessagePayload payload) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Performs a PlayCharacter action for the active player, that have sent a message that contains the action in the specified MessagePayload. The method will delegate to the CharacterController the action
      Parameters:
      payload - the payload of the message
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request was malformed

    • refillClouds

      public void refillClouds()
      Refill the clouds at the beginning of a new planning phase

    • isValidIsland

      private boolean isValidIsland(int islandIndex)
      Returns true if the island index is an index of an existing island in the game, otherwise false
      Parameters:
      islandIndex - the id of the island
      Returns:
      true if the island index is an index of an existing island in the game, otherwise false

    • setTurnPhase

      public void setTurnPhase(TurnPhase turnPhase)
      Set the value of the current turn phase
      Parameters:
      turnPhase - the value of the current turn phase

    • checkIfTurnIsEnded

      public boolean checkIfTurnIsEnded()
      Returns true if the active player can end his turn, otherwise false. The player can end the tur if he has no remaining actions or if only the PlayCharacter action remains.
      Returns:
      true if the active player can end his turn, otherwise false.

    • resetPossibleActions

      public void resetPossibleActions(RoundPhase phase)
      Reset the action that the new active players can do in base of the specified round phase. For planning phase the possible actions will contain only PlayAssistant, for the action phase the possible actions will be MoveStudents, MoveMotherNature, PickFromCloud and (if the game is expert) PlayCharacter
      Parameters:
      phase - the current round phase

    • getCurrentTurnRemainingActions

      public List<TurnPhase> getCurrentTurnRemainingActions()
      Returns the actions that the active player can do in the turn
      Returns:
      the actions that the active player can do in the turn

    • getTurnPhase

      public TurnPhase getTurnPhase()
      Returns the current turn phase on which the active player is
      Returns:
      the current turn phase on which the active player is

    • getCharacterController

      public CharacterController getCharacterController()
      Returns the CharacterController associated to this controller
      Returns:
      the CharacterController associated to this controller

    • fireError

      private void fireError(ErrorMessageType errorType, String errorInfo)
      Fires an error event to the ErrorDispatcher
      Parameters:
      errorType - the type of error
      errorInfo - the description of the error

    • restoreController

      public void restoreController(TurnPhase turnPhase, List<TurnPhase> currentTurnRemainingActions)
      Restore the action controller state after a game was restored.
      Parameters:
      turnPhase - the current turn phase (as it was before the game was stopped)
      currentTurnRemainingActions - the remaining actions that the active player can do in the turn (as they was before the game was stopped)
